Sentencas: Electrical conductivity relaxation (ECR) method is utilized to determine H-2 oxidation process on Sm0.2Ce0.8O1.9 (SDC) with scattered Pt or Au particles by increasing the H-2 partial pressure in the gas stream.
Titulo: Hydrogen oxidation at metal-ceria boundary by electrical conductivity relaxation method

Sentencas: For SDC with Au particles, the reaction occurs only at the SDC-gas interface.
Titulo: Hydrogen oxidation at metal-ceria boundary by electrical conductivity relaxation method

Sentencas: When Pt is introduced, the surface exchange kinetics can be remarkably improved whereas the contribution from the ceria-gas interface can be as small as 4.3%.
Titulo: Hydrogen oxidation at metal-ceria boundary by electrical conductivity relaxation method

Sentencas: The improvement increases linearly with the Pt-SDC boundary length, demonstrating that H-2 oxidation pathway is dominated by the Pt-SDC-gas three-phase boundaries.
Titulo: Hydrogen oxidation at metal-ceria boundary by electrical conductivity relaxation method
